name: Unfinished game, FMOD exemple
description:
This is a game demo of a prototype. 

All audio was composed and produced by Andre D. Tuffo

Dynamic audio was created on FMOD 

The programming on Unity and FMOD was made by Andre D. Tuffo

Most of the game codes were acquired on online courses and YouTube videos 

All visual arts used in game were procured on Unity and Itch.IO
